title: Adjust Machine Operating Parameters
description: A process engineer needs to adjust the operating speed of a packaging machine to improve efficiency.

tasks.description: Access the control interface for the specific packaging machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully connects to the machine's control panel.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current operating parameters and the recommended limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent views the current speed and the safe operating range.

tasks.description: Increase the machine speed by 5% and monitor the output for any quality issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adjusts the parameter and confirms the machine is operating stably at the new speed.
